statements: DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE equipment_id = 1 AND maintenance_task_id = 3;
DELETE FROM equipment_maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date < '2022-01-01' AND completion_date IS NULL;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE schedule_id = 1 AND task_description = 'Inspect equipment';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedules WHERE schedule_id = 2 OR equipment_id = 3;
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND status = 'pending';
DELETE FROM equipment WHERE location = 'Warehouse' AND install_date < '2019-06-01';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceTask WHERE task_name = 'Inspect Equipment' AND is_completed = false;
